channel.title: Phil Mike Jones
channel.description: Recent content on Phil Mike Jones

item.title: Tutorials
item.description: Tutorials Tutorials, mostly for R, Python, Linux, and QGIS.

item.title: About
item.description: Publications You can see my publications on my ORCiD profile. Specialisms I specialise in quantitative and spatial data analysis. I use R, Python, and QGIS to analyse various spatial and non-spatial data sets. I’ve authored some packages, most notably rakeR for simulating spatial data. Education PhD I have a PhD in human geography from the University of Sheffield (2018). My thesis is entitled, ‘A Spatial Microsimulation Analysis of Health Inequalities and Health Resilience’.
